title: Team menu disappears from Hierarchy and Packages view
description: The team menu is no longer visible in the step 9. This issue was initially observed with a file managed by CVS, but it also occurs with TestClass.java, which is not in any CVS repository.
OB: In step 15, after closing the two new windows, select the TestClass in the package view. The team menu is not displayed in the popup menu anymore.
EB: The team menu should remain visible in the popup menu when selecting TestClass in the package view.
SR: Ensure that the team menu is consistently displayed in the popup menu when selecting any file in the package view.
